sentences.en: He could not believe that Clemenza was guilty of treachery.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔绝不相信克莱门扎犯了背叛罪.

sentences.en: He was deeply wounded by the treachery of close aides and old friends.
sentences.cn: 他因贴身助手和老朋友的背叛而深受伤害。

sentences.en: He was deeply wounded by the treachery of close aides.
sentences.cn: 他被亲密助手的背叛深深地伤害了。

sentences.en: He was eventually brought to book for his treachery.
sentences.cn: 他终于因叛变行为而受到惩罚.

sentences.en: He was very friendly to you when the treachery would come.
sentences.cn: 当他要出卖你的时候,他对你表示非常的友好.

sentences.en: His treachery led to the capture and imprisonment of his friend.
sentences.cn: 由于他的背叛,他的朋友被捕入狱.

sentences.en: I am greased with falsehood and treachery.
sentences.cn: 我全身都涂满了虚假和不忠实的润滑油.

sentences.en: It is a treachery of one's own body.
sentences.cn: 这是对自己身体的背叛行为.

sentences.en: Still we have our limits beyond which we call dissimulation treachery.
sentences.cn: 不过我们仍然有自己的限度,超过这个界限,就是虚伪与背信弃义.

sentences.en: the treachery of those who plotted against the king
sentences.cn: 密谋反对国王者的不忠行为

sentences.en: They have taken our country by surprise and treachery and force.
sentences.cn: 他们用突击、阴谋和武力夺取了我们的国土.

sentences.en: Treachery lurked behind his smooth manners.
sentences.cn: 他圆滑姿态的后面潜伏着奸计.
